title: Four Fish- author uses World War II

content.prompt: The author uses World War II as an example of how

choices.label: the media spread misleading information about the health of the wild fish population
stable the wild fish population has remained throughout most of the twentieth century
technological advances can increase the number of wild fish caught
a temporary interruption in fishing can help the wild fish population regenerate

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
